parameter.value: I used to serve my former ninja brothers, but due to their extremely rude behaviour they decided to let me go. I now live here alone, longing for the day I can give them revenge.
I sell only assassin stars, but I don't buy anything, I don't need anything.
My name is Yamashita. I'm please to meet you |PLAYERNAME|.
I am a ninja. As you might have noticed, I live here alone. My former clan decided to leave me, they found my behaviour not as ruthless as their.
These are the Barren Cliffs. Its gigantic surface stretches over the south and east part of Dustwit. Be aware of getting lost here, you might end up as a prey for the dangerous wild life.
I know Tha'Reen, it's a settlement in the west. I've never been there, and I don't suppose I would be welcome either. I prefer it here.
I have never left Dustwit, except once when I swimmed, but that's unimportant.
Djinns, you say. I hope for your own sake you don't play any high roller game with these djinns. They are dangerous.
My former people's behaviour was ruthless. They kill just for fun. It's out-rageous. A true ninja fights only when he needs to.
My only quest left is to get satisfaction, and there's only one way of doing that.
I need to pull revenge upon my former people. I know how, I do have a plan, but I believe I'm a little too old to execute it smoothly enough not to get injured meanwhile.
Sanjuro was a legend even before he died. He's buried in the hideout the ninjas has built close to here. His skull rests in a sacred tomb, there.
Greetings, explorer. What in heavens sake brings you up here?
Bye, |PLAYERNAME|. Just watch out for trouble.
